about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Token Pack 159: Sinister Snakes

From the treacherous southern jungles a collection of sinister serpents is invading! This nest of nefarious nagas feature 27 tokens of various genders and shapes. From the infamous half snake half person, to sneaky humanoid forms with coiled cobra like appendages and full serpentine soldiers, with a mixture of ranged and close quarter weapons! Hatch this venomous pit of scaled scheming snakes into the depths of your campaign today and remind your heroes why these cold blooded foes make theirs run hot!

detailed_description:
"

Devin Night Token Pack 159: Sinister Snakes

From the treacherous southern jungles a collection of sinister serpents is invading! This nest of nefarious nagas feature 27 tokens of various genders and shapes. From the infamous half snake half person, to sneaky humanoid forms with coiled cobra like appendages and full serpentine soldiers, with a mixture of ranged and close quarter weapons! Hatch this venomous pit of scaled scheming snakes into the depths of your campaign today and remind your heroes why these cold blooded foes make theirs run hot!

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
